text: Pontus Lars Mikael Åhman (born 5 December 1994) is a Swedish rally driver, who drives in the Sweden Junior Rally Championship. In 2015 and 2016, Åhman competed in the ADAC Opel Rallye Cup and finished eighth and third. ==Career results== ===ADAC Opel Rallye Cup results=== {| class="wikitable" border="1" style="text-align:center; font-size:90%;" |- !
